meanings.definition: To convert (data) into a format that can be processed by a computer as a series of vectors.
meanings.sent1: I vectorized the image to make it easier for the computer to understand.
meanings.sent2: The software automatically vectorized the text for efficient processing.
meanings.sent3: After I vectorized the file, the computer suddenly became very happy!
meanings.sent4: She skillfully vectorized the information, turning chaos into order.
meanings.sent5: The artist's ability to vectorize complex data sets was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: Made up of or relating to vectors.
meanings.sent1: The vectorized diagram helped us understand the direction of the forces.
meanings.sent2: Her presentation included a vectorized illustration to clarify the concept.
meanings.sent3: The vectorized design on the shirt made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a vectorized manner, always focused and precise.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with vectorized decorations, giving it a modern feel.
